item.title: The Mic Check Show SEASON FINALE
item.description: 1. The L.O.X - Were Back 2. Masta Ace - Nostalgia 3. Termanology - Take It Back 4. Remo Da Rapstar Feat Richie Sosa - I Bang 5. Joell Ortiz Feat Styles P - Time Is Money 6. Esso - Never Live My Life 7. Sha Stimuli - In The Hood 8. Ransom - Da Whole Story 9. DJ Babu Feat Little Brother & Joe Scudda - Fan Mail 10. Evidence Feat Phonte & Alchemist - Let Yourself Go 11. Talib Kweli - Say Something 12. Gawdbless - Get It In 13. Jakk Frost Feat Starr Mina - Gangsta Luv 14. Jakk Frost & Freeway - Hit Da Club Up 15. Termanolgy - I Did It 16. Busta Rhymes & Papoose - We Got The Streets 23. Trife Da God - Game Don't Change 24. Red Cafe - Murderer 25. St Laz - Dreamworld 26. Big Lou - No One Does It Better 27. Remo Da Rapstar - One Hit Away 28. Keith Murray - Nobody Does It Better 29. Jazzy Jeff Feat Big Daddy Kane - The Garden

item.title: The Mic Check Show [Ep 20] NEW INTENSE, KANYE WEST, TRAV, TERMANOLOGY
item.description: 1. Common & Kanye West - Southside Superbowl 2. Intense Feat Capone - Raw Uncut 3. Skyzoo & Torae - Get It Done 4. Hell Razah Feat Tragedy Khadafi & RA The Rugged Man 5. Nas Feat Feat. Redhead Kingpin, Rob Base, Original Spinderella, Father MC, Monie Love, Mike Gee (Jungle Brothers), E-S-T (3XDope), Dres (Black Sheep), Das Efx, DoItAll (Lords of the Underground), Chip-Fu (Fu-Schnickens) and Positive K - Where Are They Now [90's Remix] 6. Freeway - Shootouts 7. Nina B, Remo Da Rapstar & Esso - New Government 8. AC - Music's Funeral 9. Trav - Vinny Idol Crack Freestyle 10. Nitty - Losin Weight Freestyle 11. Nitty - Do You Hear Me 12. Termanology - Can't Get Enough 13. DJ Jazzy Jeff & CL Smooth - All I Know 14. Esso - I Love My Block 15. Craig Mack - I Heard 16. Nas Feat MC Shan, Raheem (Furious Five), Doctor Ice (UTFO), Kangol (UTFO), Kool Moe Dee, Sha Rock (Funky Four +1), Tito (Fearless Four), Grandmaster Caz (Cold Crush Brothers), Lique (Isis of X Clan), Dana Dane, Pebblee Poo & Just Ice - Where Are They Now [80's Remix] 17. Intense Feat Trife Da God & Tommy Whispers - It's A Shame

item.title: The Mic Check Show [Episode 16] HAPPY NEW YEARS ALL NEW MIXSHOW

item.title: The Mic Check Show [Episode 15] ALL NEW MUSIC THIS WEEK
item.description: Happy New Years! Be Safe Everybody... New and I mean NEW tracks from Nas, Saigon, Ghostface Killah, Trife Da God, Slum Village & Pete Rock, plus Termanology, Styles P, more Nas, and a ton of others... be back next week...
item.dc:creator: DJ 1Mic
item.itunes:summary: Happy New Years! Be Safe Everybody... New and I mean NEW tracks from Nas, Saigon, Ghostface Killah, Trife Da God, Slum Village & Pete Rock, plus Termanology, Styles P, more Nas, and a ton of others... be back next week...

item.title: The Mic Check Show [Episode 14] XXtra Special Holiday Episode
item.description: XXtra Special Holiday Episode 1st 30 minutes all Nas, 2nd 30 minutes all Styles P... Plus a bonus holiday track at the end.... this is the definition of classic hip-hop
item.dc:creator: DJ 1Mic
item.itunes:summary: XXtra Special Holiday Episode 1st 30 minutes all Nas, 2nd 30 minutes all Styles P... Plus a bonus holiday track at the end.... this is the definition of classic hip-hop

item.title: The Mic Check Show [Episode 13] UNBELIEVABLE NEW MIX GOING ON
item.description: Crazy line up with all the biggest and best names, Nas is on fire... Termanology, Saigon, Papoose, Styles P...plus so much more THANKS TO EVERYONE CHECKIN ME OUT EVERY WEEK HAPPY HOLIDAYS!
item.dc:creator: DJ 1Mic
item.itunes:summary:
Crazy line up with all the biggest and best names, Nas is on fire... Termanology, Saigon, Papoose, Styles P...plus so much more
THANKS TO EVERYONE CHECKIN ME OUT EVERY WEEK HAPPY HOLIDAYS!

item.title: The Mic Check Show [Episode 12] [Season 2] BEST SHOW EVER
item.description: the past week my audience grew 500% and i couldn't possibly be more excited to bring this weeks new offering, 60 minutes packed with the best hip-hop period, tracks off the new Nas Hip Hop Is Dead album, new music from Termanology, Saigon, Cormega, Styles P, Talib Kweli, Black Rob, and much more!

item.title: The Mic Check Show [Episode 11] [Season 2]
item.description: All new music, featuring the return of Nas, with tracks from his upcoming album, Hip Hop Is Dead... Plus new Jay-Z, Game, Nature, John D.O.E

ENJOY!!!

item.title: The Mic Check Show [Season 2][Season Premiere]{Part 1}
item.description: Season Premiere of the critically acclaimed mixshow featuring the #1 up-and-coming dj on the east coast. The mixtape master brings you his full hour weekly show this year, packed full with new hip hop thats actually good, not dull and repetitive like FM radio. Hip-hop is alive and breathing and this is the proof. Enjoy!!
